text: 1:22 Efesus 2:14-16; 5:27; 1 Tesalonika 4:7; Taitus 2:14Ezɨ God kamaghɨn ifonge, a ia inigh ua bagh izam. Eghtɨ ia an gumazamizibar mɨn ikɨva, an damazimɨn bar zueghɨva, arazir kuratam ian ikian kogham. Kamaghsua datɨrɨghɨn Godɨn Otarim angamɨra gumazir mɨkarzim sara areme, ezɨ tuavir kamɨn God uam e ko navir vamɨra inis.
